Text: all the other superman are uploaded. please check my profile to download them
Wow! Many many thanks for all the superman movies!

I just found out about you sir. Goodness gracious. You are making me re-do all my HD video collection. Thank you so much for these wonderful, smaller sized released w/o compromising too much of the quality. You.Are.Awesome.

Love,
a new fan :D

This is a good upload, but I wish these were 1000Mb each file so you can have all 4 on one 4.37GB DVD and at a good bitrate.

I converted my original DVD's (although they are only small at 720x300) and the first movie (the longest) has a bitrate of 866 Kbps.

Hard to get way with 700Mb files on a 2h 30m movie :p 

These YIFY ones do look good for the size. Ideally I want 1080p ones @ about 1000Mb but I think the cursed pixelation would be there again at that file size.
